name: Magical Jumping Bean
description:
In Magical Jumping Bean you play as Bean: a cheerful, fast moving bean who is all about going fast and doing you best! Control bean as you go through the three game modes to be the fastest bean in the world! Be sure to use the relaxing hub world to hone your skills or just take a break and relax.

GAME MODES:

OBSTACLE COURSE: Move from one end of the floor to the other as fast as possible without falling off, as you continue moving up the floors the areas will get bigger and the obstacles more difficult and deadly!

WAYPOINT RACE: Quickly move through the area in search of the mysterious floating blue bean before time runs out! Each time you reach the blue bean or move to a bigger floor time gets added so keep moving!

INFINITY RUNNER: See how far you can get in a straight run through various obstacles as they appear before your very eyes! But don't take too long because the obstacles behind you will start to dissapear faster and faster as the clock keeps ticking!

DISCLAIMER: I didn't get to extensively test the mac and linux versions of Magical Jumping Bean, so they are likely far more buggy than the windows version.
